featured.text: In Switzerland, there is a saying that every good Swiss citizen has one in his or her pocket.

definition.zh_def: 瑞士，位於歐洲中部的國家，以其美麗的山脈、銀行業和中立政策聞名。
definition.en_def: Switzerland, a landlocked country in Central Europe known for its beautiful mountains, banking industry, and policy of neutrality.
definition.example: I dream of visiting Switzerland to see the Alps and enjoy the chocolate.
